title: CHAMBER BANQUET
full_story:
1/8/26
Tickets for the 2025 Flora Chamber of Commerce Awards Banquet are officially on sale.
The Banquet will be held at the Nostalgia Theatre on January 31
st
with social hour at 6:00 PM and the Dinner and Program at 7:00 PM.  The meal will be provided by Poe’d Smoked BBQ.
Tickets are $30 per person and are available through January 23rd.  Tickets may be purchased in person at the Chamber office.  The office is open on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Friday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
If you have any questions, call Arriel Dulaney at the Chamber office at 618-662-5646.

title: HO HO HOLIDAY HIGHLIGHT WINNERS
full_story:
1/8/26
The winners to the WNOI Ho Ho Holiday Highlight Contest were drawn yesterday during the ReVue.  During December a different business was featured every day, and listeners were asked to write down the names of each business.
Winning third prize and a $75 shopping spree to the Ho Ho Holiday Highlight business of his choice is Troy Thomas of Flora.  Troy has chosen to spend his prize at the Save a Lot Food store in Fairfield.  Second prize, a $150 shopping spree to the Ho Ho Holiday Highlight business of her choice is Mandy Bergstrom of Rinard.  And winning the top prize, a $300 shopping spree to the Ho Ho Holiday Highlight business of her choice is Cinda Hildebrand of Clay City.
Congratulations to all the winners and thanks to the sponsors for making the Ho Ho Holiday Highlight contest possible.
